sourcesContent:
import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Application } from '../model/application.model'; import { Technology } from '../model/technology.model'; import { FormBuilder, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { formatDate } from '@angular/common'; @Component({ selector: 'app-form', templateUrl: './form.component.html', styleUrls: ['./form.component.css'] }) export class FormComponent implements OnInit { @Input("application") application: Application | null = null; @Input("technologies") technologies: Array = []; applicationForm = this.fb.group({ description: ["", Validators.maxLength(300)], email: ["", [Validators.required, Validators.email]], neededTill: [formatDate(new Date(), "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm", "en"), Validators.required], newTechnology: [false], technology: this.fb.group({ type: [""], ram: [4], cores: [1], motherboard: [""], gpu: [""], }), }); constructor(private fb: FormBuilder) {} ngOnInit(): void { // This means that we are editing an application if (this.application) { this.applicationForm.patchValue({ description: this.application.description, email: this.application.email, neededTill: formatDate(new Date(this.application.neededTill), "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm", "en"), newTechnology: this.application.technology ? true : false, technology: { type: this.application.technology?.type, ram: this.application.technology?.ram, cores: this.application.technology?.cores, motherboard: this.application.technology?.motherboard, gpu: this.application.technology?.gpu, } }); } } }

Edit application

Apply

Why do you need this? No more than 300 characters.
Type RAM (GB) Cores Motherboard GPU
{{t.type}} {{t.ram}} {{t.cores}} {{toDate(a.neededTill) | date: 'dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm'}} {{a.technology?.type}} {{a.status}}
